data.oai_dc:dc: MBNMS/PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: La Cruz Rock, California, USA (LAC001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at La Cruz Rock, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2008-03-20. The instrument depth was 004 meters, in an overall water depth of 23 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
